title: Everything You Need to Know About Royal Birthmarks

steps.title: Royal birthmarks are distinctive marks thought to prove royal heritage.
steps.content: Royal birthmarks are distinctive marks thought to prove royal heritage. In the past, people believed these marks were passed down by royal and noble families. This superstition is mentioned in many historical stories and myths as a way to distinguish royalty from common people. [1] X Research source Royal birthmarks don't have one specific shape, but some believe that any birthmark or beauty mark is a sign of royal heritage. Some people associate royal birthmarks with related traits, like good posture and leadership skills.

Physical attractiveness. People with royal birthmarks may have conventionally beautiful features, like symmetrical faces and clear skin. They are also more likely to have a tall and slender body shape. [2] X Research source Noble mannerisms. Some believe royal birthmarks give someone more grace, poise, and elegance than others. [3] X Research source Confidence and charm. People with royal birthmarks exude charisma and come off as very self-assured. This trait may also make them seem domineering in their speech and body language. [4] X Research source Natural leaders. People with royal birthmarks tend to command respect from others. They can command attention when they want to and make a strong impression on others. [5] X Research source Creativity. People with royal birthmarks may be skilled in artistic activities like painting, singing, writing, or drawing. [6] X Research source Luck and prosperity. Royal birthmarks may pass on good luck and success from their wealthy origins. Some people believe you can touch a royal birthmark for good luck. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Angel kisses or stork bites.
steps.content: Angel kisses or stork bites. These birthmarks are flat, pink patches on a baby’s skin. They are believed to be a mark of love and protection. [8] X Research source

steps.title: Circles.
steps.content: Circles. Circular-shaped birthmarks may offer protection or healing. [9] X Research source

steps.title: Diamonds.
steps.content: Diamonds. Diamond-shaped birthmarks are believed to predict wealth or fortune. [10] X Research source

steps.title: Heart-shaped birthmarks.
steps.content: Heart-shaped birthmarks. These marks convey love, and may be a sign of good luck or affection. [11] X Research source

steps.title: Star-shaped birthmarks.
steps.content: Star-shaped birthmarks. These marks may show a special talent or promise of success. [12] X Research source

steps.title: Animal-shaped birthmarks.
steps.content: Animal-shaped birthmarks. A specific animal may indicate a spirit animal or a special connection to animals in general. [13] X Research source

steps.title: Moon-shaped or sunburst birthmarks.
steps.content: Moon-shaped or sunburst birthmarks. These shapes may show a strong connection to the stars and astrology . [14] X Research source

Forehead: Birthmarks on the right side of the forehead show intelligence. The left side shows irresponsibility. [15] X Research source Neck: Birthmarks on your neck may show great success and responsibility in life. [16] X Research source Back: A birthmark on your back shows an open mind. [17] X Research source Leg: A birthmark on your leg may show a lack of independence. [18] X Research source Face: A birthmark on your face means you might be destined for success or fame. [19] X Research source Hand: A hand birthmark shows independence and skill in craftsmanship. [20] X Research source Arm: Birthmarks on the arm might show someone who is in control of their destiny. [21] X Research source Stomach: Birthmarks on your stomach might show a love for material things. [22] X Research source Chest: A birthmark on the chest can show that you follow your heart. [23] X Research source

steps.title: Some people believe birthmarks are caused by past lives or experiences.
steps.content: Some people believe birthmarks are caused by past lives or experiences. A common belief is that birthmarks inform us about how our past lives ended. For example, a flame-shaped mark could hint at a death by fire. Likewise, a birthmark’s location could be due to a wound. [24] X Research source If you have no birthmark, some people believe your last life ended due to natural causes. In some countries, such as Japan, birthmarks were thought to be caused by women staring at fires.

steps.title: Scientifically, birthmarks result from skin pigmentation or blood vessels.
steps.content: Scientifically, birthmarks result from skin pigmentation or blood vessels. Pigmented birthmarks can be brown or blue, and they develop from darker pigments in the skin. Vascular birthmarks are pink and red and appear where blood vessels are underdeveloped. [25] X Trustworthy Source American Academy of Dermatology Professional organization made of over 20,000 certified dermatologists Go to source Scientists don’t understand the cause of every type of birthmark or their variations. Most birthmarks aren’t considered hereditary unless due to a genetic condition. More than 10% of babies are born with some birthmark, the rarest being a port wine stain.
